attributes.review: This app tracks all activities on other apps in the background and also makes your battery drain faster. If you don’t want your search history, app activity, or anything else you would rather keep private monitored don’t get this app
attributes.title: This app is malware

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could teach my gerbil about politics, but then she died!!! 😪 She could not handle the racism and misogyny that radiated off of it ✨. I promptly deleted the gross app, but not before the spirit of my gerbil appeared and told me she was going to haunt me for the rest of my life. Now I live in horror and despair. One star. 🧚🏻‍♂️✨
attributes.title: I hate everything about this app💫💐🧚🏻✨🌼
